resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102873</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102873</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207170</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">By the People, For the People: Posters from the WPA, 1936-1943</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durch die Leute für die Leute: Plakate vom 
WPA, 1936-1943</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Par les personnes, pour le peuple : Affiches 
du WPA, 1936-1943</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pelos povos, para os povos: Posteres do WPA, 
1936-1943</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dalla gente, per la gente: Manifesti dal WPA,
1936-1943</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από τους ανθρώπους, για τους ανθρώπους: Αφίσες 
από το WPA, 1936-1943</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Por la gente, para la gente: Carteles del 
WPA, 1936-1943</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a collection of 900 boldly colored and graphically diverse posters produced as part of FDR's New Deal. These striking silkscreens, lithographs, and woodcuts were created to publicize health and safety programs; cultural programs including art exhibitions, theatrical, and musical performances; travel and tourism; educational programs; and community activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Ansammlung von 900 mutig gefärbt und von 
den graphisch verschiedenen Plakaten, die als Teil des neuen Abkommens
FDR produziert werden. Diese auffallenden silkscreens, 
Lithographien und woodcuts wurden erstellt, um Gesundheit und 
Sicherheit Programme zu publizieren; kulturelle Programme 
einschließlich die Kunstausstellungen, theatrical und die 
musikalischen Leistungen; Spielraum und Tourismus; 
pädagogische Programme; und Gemeinschaftsaktivitäten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une collection de 900 gras colorée et 
d'affiches graphiquement diverses produites en tant qu'élément de la
nouvelle affaire du FDR. Ces silkscreens, lithographies, et 
gravures sur bois saisissants ont été créés pour donner de la publicité
à des programmes de salubrité et de sûreté ; programmes 
comprenant des expositions d'art, théâtrales culturels, et des 
exécutions musicales ; voyage et tourisme ; programmes 
éducatifs ; et activités de la communauté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma coleção de 900 colorida corajosamente e 
dos posteres gràfica diversos produzidos como a parte do negócio 
novo do FDR. Estes silkscreens, lithographs, e woodcuts 
impressionantes foram criados para publicize programas da saúde e de 
segurança; programas including os exhibitions de arte, 
theatrical cultural, e desempenhos musicais; curso e tourism; 
programas educacionais; e atividades da comunidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una collezione di 900 colorata GRASSETTO e di 
manifesti graficamente vari prodotti come componente di nuovo affare 
del FDR. Questi silkscreens, litografie e woodcuts notevoli sono
stati creati per divulg i programmi di sanità e sicurezza; 
programmi compreso le mostre di arte, teatrali culturali e le 
prestazioni musicali; corsa e turismo; programmi 
educativi; ed attività della Comunità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια συλλογή 900 θαρραλέα χρωματισμένων και 
γραφικά διαφορετικών αφισών που παράγονται ως τμήμα της νέας 
διαπραγμάτευσης FDR. Αυτοί που χτυπούν silkscreens, 
lithographs, και οι ξυλογραφίες δημιουργήθηκαν για να 
κοινοποιήσουν τα προγράμματα υγείας και ασφάλειας  
πολιτιστικά προγράμματα συμπεριλαμβανομένων των εκθέσεων 
τέχνης, των θεατρικών, και μουσικών αποδόσεων  ταξίδι και 
τουρισμός  εκπαιδευτικά προγράμματα  και κοινοτικές 
δραστηριότητες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una colección de 900 coloreada audazmente y de 
carteles gráficamente diversos producidos como parte del nuevo 
reparto del FDR. Estos silkscreens, litografías, y woodcuts 
llamativos fueron creados para publicar programas de salud y de 
seguridad; programas incluyendo las exposiciones de arte, de 
teatro culturales, y los funcionamientos musicales; recorrido y 
turismo; programas educativos; y actividades de la 
comunidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207170</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102873</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/by-the-people-for-the-people-posters-from-the-wpa-1936-1943</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
